properties.text: The AIM toolkit is developed by CCS in collaboration with IMDA and builds upon IMDA’s AI Verify toolkit, relying on a set of principles that are more applicable to the competition and consumer protection framework in Singapore. The AIM toolkit allows both AI model developers and AI model deployers (“AI businesses”) to self-assess whether their AI models and business practices are in compliance with the Competition Act and the Consumer Protection (Fair Trading) Act (“CPFTA”). The toolkit also serves to highlight beneficial General Good Practices for businesses adopting AI. The AIM toolkit can be utilised either before deployment or after the development of an AI model.

The results generated by the AIM toolkit are intended solely for informational purposes and to assist organizations in self-assessing their AI systems against a range of principles. These results do not constitute legal advice or an official endorsement by the Competition and Consumer Commission of Singapore (CCS).  Regardless of the outcome of the AIM toolkit assessment, CCS does not certify or guarantee that your AI systems are in full compliance with Singapore's Competition Act, Consumer Protection (Fair Trading) Act, or any other applicable laws and regulations. It remains the responsibility of each organization to ensure that their AI systems comply with all relevant legal obligations.  For formal advice or confirmation of compliance, organizations should seek independent legal counsel.

properties.title: This CCS Checklist assesses your AI practices against 8 principles.

properties.text: For each principle, the report is structured as follows: You will first see the responses you provided during the self-assessment. This is followed by a summary report that includes a chart showing the distribution of your responses, along with a list of questions where you selected "No"—indicating that your response does not align with CCS's preferred or positive outcome. Finally, CCS provides recommendations on steps you can take to improve alignment with our principles based on your responses.
